description: Validates the syntax of a matchmaking rule or rule set. This operation checks that the rule set is using syntactically correct JSON and that it conforms to allowed property expressions. To validate syntax, provide a rule set JSON string.

parameters.name: RuleSetBody
parameters.description: A collection of matchmaking rules to validate, formatted as a JSON string.

nested_items.name: Valid
nested_items.description: A response indicating whether the rule set is valid.
